title: Entering series for 2nd time, but without a free win.
body: My in-game name is 'ReformedJosh'. I am Gold 4, but in my series two Gold 3. This is my second time in this series, but I have not received a free win. Why is this? Could this be fixed?

replies.body: After looking over your account, it looks to me like you maybe should have had that promo helper activated. I'm not _super_ involved with ranked myself, but it this does look like it's only your second time going into this division promo, which means you should have a [**promo helper**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h2q3) (unless I'm reading this wrong). Go ahead and reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can look over this and see what we can do.
